additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Corn Syrup, Water, Wheat Powder, Rice Powder, Salt, Hot Pepper, Powder (6%), Alcohol, Garlic, Flavour Enhancer (620), Acidity Regulator (327), Onion, Sweetener (960), Koji

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Contains alcohol 3mL/100g which will be reduced after cooking.

description: Ottogi Gochujang is a famous gochujang made with fermented rice, wheat and red chilli peppers. It is a savory, sweet, and spicy fermented condiment and has a versatile usage from preparing Bibimbap (Korean mixed rice) to Korean hot pot / stew, Korean rice cake (Tteokbokki), etc. It is made in Korea.
name: Hot Pepper Paste
